title: Sabita Acharya defends her PhD thesis | Natural Language Processing Laboratory | University of Illinois at Chicago

Natural Language Processing Laboratory     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Natural Language Processing Laboratory      Natural Language Processing Laboratory   Main Menu    Research           Methodology and Foundational Work    NL for Educational Technology    Summarization for Entertainment and Healthcare    Human-Robot Interaction         People    Publications    Resources    Photos    News     Eyebrow menu    Computer Science    College of Engineering    Contact    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Sabita Acharya defends her PhD thesis    Posted on March 13, 2019       Sabita Acharya successfully defended her PhD thesis, titled: "Generating Personalized Hospital-stay Summaries for Patients"  Her committee included: Barbara Di Eugenio (advisor), Andrew Johnson, Debaleena Chattopadhyay, Andrew Boyd, and Richard Cameron      Modified on March 17, 2019
